archimate:Capability.name: Program Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to organize, plan, direct, and communicate progress against one or a collection of temporary endeavors or projects undertaken to create a unique outcome, using the setting and achieving of milestones to deliver those outcomes within defined resources, time, quality, and scope constraints.

properties.value: Ability to organize, plan, direct, and communicate progress against one or a collection of temporary endeavors or projects undertaken to create a unique outcome, using the setting and achieving of milestones to deliver those outcomes within defined resources, time, quality, and scope constraints.
